name: iAlly
description:
iAlly is a sci-fi-mystery-action game developed with Unreal Engine 5. In the game, you control a character who wakes up in a museum and finds himself in a strange labyrinth and puzzles.



  • All the artifacts in the museum are 3D models of real-world artifacts. Are you ready for a thrilling adventure that makes you feel like a time traveler in a museum full of real historical artifacts?




  • You can play iAlly alone or with people from your own friend list. The game becomes more complex and difficult with each character. The controls are simple and smooth.




  • iAlly is a sci-fi game that starts in a museum consisting of various themed domes filled with unique, complex but simple puzzles. Find the clues and solve the codes to get out of the museum!





  • iAlly is not just a museum full of puzzles. There is also a guard who tries to catch you. The guard can hear your voice and tie you up. But don’t worry! You can also find items in the game that can trick or escape the guard.





  • iAlly offers you a different option from the game mode because it takes place in a museum consisting of real artifacts from around the world. In this mode, you can freely roam around the museum with your friends, witness geological times without solving puzzles, and examine real artifacts.
